alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 26 at 12:32PM MST until June 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas along and north of the Mogollon Rim, into the Little Colorado River Valley and Navajo Nation. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Patchy blowing dust will also be possible over portions of the Navajo Nation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
